metadata.name: Maverix (unrevealed)
metadata.description:
A NFT project around Art, Design & Production on the Blockchain
7777 multi-utility NFTs which are the key to [MetaMaverix](https://www.metamaverix.com) with the following offerings:

- Seasonal VR ready Fashion & Digital Accessories NFTs (access to presale Mint)
- Curated line of IRL with % of profits going back to the Maverix token holders
- Up to 20% discount on IRL for Maverix token holders
- Daily reward tokens redeemable within the MetaMaverix ecosystem
- Governance by DAO
- Maverix Avatarpair free mint
- Unique shopping experience with MetaMaverix VR concept store
- Swappable PFP
- NFT Kick-Start Fund
